SELECT a.id,a.org_id,a.goods_id,s.goods_code,s.goods_name,b.code depot_code,b.name depot_name,a.stock_num, a.ctime,a.cemp_name,a.utime,a.uemp_name,a.description FROM t_stock_info a, t_depot b,t_goods s
and a.depot_id=b.id and a.goods_id=s.goods_id
AND (s.goods_id = #{queryForm.goodsId} OR s.goods_name LIKE concat('%', #{queryForm.goodsId}, '%'))
AND (b.id = #{queryForm.depotId} OR b.name LIKE concat('%', #{queryForm.depotId}, '%'))
order by a.goods_id,a.depot_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_stock_info(org_id, goods_id, depot_id, stock_num, ctime, cemp_name, description, ts01) VALUES( #{orgId}, #{goodsId}, #{depotId}, #{stockNum}, #{ctime}, #{cempName}, #{description}, #{ts01})
